content: When I was younger, I hated going to weddings. My grandmothers and aunts would huddle around me, poke me in the side, and giggle "You're next! You're next!" They only stopped this nonsense when I began to do the same thing at funerals.
translations: ita:Quando ero pi√π giovane, odiavo andare ai matrimoni. Le mie nonne e le mie zie si stringevano attorno a me, mi davano un
